response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it would be an invaluable asset to you. We're extending this opportunity with a special offer, allowing you to acquire it for $10,000. This price reflects the value we place on making high-quality products accessible while ensuring we maintain our standards and profitability. We're confident this investment will pay off in terms of functionality, efficiency, and satisfaction. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. We look forward to serving you.", "product_price": 10000}
